messages.content: I wouldn't mind taking sentries but i almost always take a jaw wurm or two
So I can't take all three
maybe jaw wurm before any nerfs
when it was 14(17) block 2(3) strength

Strength down effects are always going to be very strong, considering how many of the most dangerous enemies in the spire use multihits that get severly countered by these effects. Strength down makes a ton of sense on the collector as well, since they the boss version is focused on debuffing the player, and lagavulin provides this same debuff when you fight them (though they also give -2 dex, which would be very hard to implement on enemies). I really like this card from a flavor and function standpoint, though I do think it's too powerful overall. I agree with the suggestion to have the cost go up to 2, since this is aoe after all (a bit like flash powder if it didn't give block and came pre-upgraded). 

Since this is a collected card for an elite, you only need to hold 1 essence and hunt act 1 elites to obtain it, which means that you will encounter it in most runs. You're 1 in 3 to find lagavulin, and 1 in 2 if you missed them in your last fight. Assuming that you are trying to fight 3+ elites in act 1, that gives you a very good chance to find this, and sentries is also a very strong collected card, so you are heavily incentivized to build towards a strong act 1 deck with good frontloading. This is already true of most characters in base game and downfall, but especially so for collector, as lagavulin is currently strong enough to neuter many of the toughest enemies you might find in a run.

Every collected card is naturally going to be in competition with the rest, since you only draw 1 per turn, and generally want at least 5 so that you can have a pseudo ring of the serpent that will last through short and medium length fights. This one stands very tall amongst the others, and is found early enough to make you think twice about taking middling to decent collected cards throughout the rest of the run. I find it veyr difficult to take all but the best collected cards once I have something as powerful as this that I could be drawing into.
repulser + darklings goes crazy, draws your whole deck when getting rid of every card you dont need.
I already talked about lagavulin, I'm in agreement that its busted.
I had a run where I got 3 lagavulins before, found 2 lagas out of 4 elites and then got a third from the :dead:  event (the game got completely brutalized!)
meanwhil in my run yesterday, while I only had 2 lagas, I had dark apotheosis and soulforge+
so yeah
the game got torn in half
